name: Nick Offerman
summary: Nick Offerman. Actor: Devs. Nick Offerman was born in Joliet, Illinois, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for Parks and Recreation (2009), The Founder (2016), 21 Jump Street (2012), 22 Jump Street (2014), We Are The Millers (2013), and Fargo (2014). He has been married to Megan Mullally since September 20, 2003.
awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys | 3 wins & 28 nominations total
